about_the_game:
Enhance your journey through 'A Twisted Path To Renown' with the Premium Edition, including the Original game and the Premium Pack.



The Premium Pack includes:
  • A complete list of features of 'A Twisted Path To Renown' - Standard Edition
  • Additional Standard Vault Extension (9 x 7 cells)
  • A 'Premium Edition' starter items list:
    - 1x Blued Sentry Safe (2x2 size, accommodates 8 items of almost any category)
    - $30.00 (in-game currency)
    - 3x Revolver 16"; Barrel Semi-Pistol Grip .44
    - 6x Ammunition .44
    - 4x Ammunition .38
    - 6x Echinacea Salve (1/2oz)
    - 1x Aid Box (accommodates 4 items from the "Medicine" category)
    - 3x Splint
    - 2x Canned Deer Heart with Potato (Quickness booster)
    - 2x Canned Bass with Carrot (Sprinting Speed booster)
    - 1x Traveler's Satchel (4x4 capacity)
    - 2x Hunting Sidebag (2x3 capacity)
    - 2x Hunter Cartridge Belt (2 ammo slots)
    - 2x Single Sidearm Holster
    - 2x Lightweight Single Rifle Holster
    - 1x Small Storage Bin (2x2 size, accommodates 12 items from "Wood" and "Ore" categories)
    - 4x 350 Coal
    - 2x 2745 Iron Ore
    - 2x 4840 Lead Ore
    - 2x 2754 Zinc Ore
    - 2x 1600 Oak Log
  • A 'Premium' status in the game
  • A 'Homestead Expansion' Premium bonus pack (available mid/late 2024)

name: A Twisted Path To Renown - Premium Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible audio card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible audio card

steam_germany.descriptors:
Drastische Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak
Derbe Sprache

short_description: Try to survive the wilds of 1899 America. Join intense raids, craft vital items, and make deals with others. Build and expand your Homestead - a cradle of your farming, mining, prospecting and uniting your lands into businesses and production. Forge your legacy and build your path to renown.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
